    • Method Detail

      • minimum

        public void minimum(long min)

        Modify the Accumulator so that its value is no less than the supplied value. The contribution is immediately accumulated into the live value, and it is also posted with a Delta instance to the supplied Transaction. This method may be called only within the scope of an active Transaction.

        Parameters:
        min - The candidate minimum value
